title: My IWCA seats have been changed at the last minute
body:
Had seats next to my friends just got an email from ticketek saying they changed my seating and now they put us in completely different sections 
This is stupid the whole reason i am going is with friends im not going to be comfortable sitting with strangers

Trying to contact ticketek http://ticketek.custhelp.com/ but under categories there is nothing relevant to my situation i think
